title: Old Spanish National Historic Trail: Partners
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Partners             Partners       The Bureau of Land Management and the National Park Service will work with other federal agencies, state and local governments, organizations, tribes, and private individuals to administer the national historic trail. The Old Spanish Trail Association, a major trail partner, is a national organization dedicated to the preservation, public awareness, and appreciation of the Old Spanish Trail. Visit the association's website at www.oldspanishtrail.org.  Â    Challenge Cost Share
